name: personal-management-system
tagline: A self-hosted platform for managing personal productivity
description: Personal Management System is a self-hosted platform that helps track tasks, expenses, plans, and timesheets. It includes a customizable UI for managing personal productivity and goals.

features.title: Task Management
features.description: Create, organize, and track tasks with priorities, due dates, and completion status for personal productivity

features.title: Timesheet Management
features.description: Record work hours and activities with timesheet functionality for freelancers or personal time tracking

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Upload and organize personal documents and files with categorization and search capabilities

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Personalize the interface with widgets and layouts that display the information most relevant to you

features.title: Calendar Integration
features.description: View tasks, goals, and events on a unified calendar for comprehensive schedule management
